resources.string: Well done you have successfully completed the stage
In the next stages you have to choose the right taste for the fish before starting to play .....
Remember the right bait to catch each fish before the end of time

Welcome to the fishing game In this fun game you have to catch the fish by clicking on the fish before fish escape But you have to catch the fish you need at each stage to get 10 points for each fish If you catch the wrong fish you will lose 5 points You must collect a certain number of points in each stage before the end of time
Do you want to exit the application?
Do you want to get out of the stage
Do you want to return to the main interface?
At this stage the fish you want to catch will change constantly so you should look at the bar at the top of the screen constantly
Catch the fish by clicking on it to collect points You must catch the fish shown in the bar at the top of the screen to get 10 points If you catch another fish will lose 5 points
